definitionBody:
BEGIN
  -- Marcar tokens FREE expirados
  UPDATE `sunny-advantage-471523-b3.IS_Fundamentales.api_tokens`
  SET status = 'expired'
  WHERE status = 'active'
    AND expiry_date < CURRENT_DATE()
    AND expiry_date IS NOT NULL;
  
  -- Log de ejecución (opcional)
  -- INSERT INTO logs (procedure_name, executed_at, rows_affected)
  -- VALUES ('sp_mark_expired_trials', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), @@row_count);
END
